TopicTitle: How do you use the Crater Crawler?

Articles.Content: How do you get the Crater Crawler rover to anywhere but Kerbin? It's too big to fit in any rocket I can think of.

5 minutes ago, MAFman said:

How do you get the Crater Crawler rover to anywhere but Kerbin? It's too big to fit in any rocket I can think of.

In KSP, you can get away with absolutely ridiculous payloads. 

Last night I launched a 6x8m surface base up on a 2.5m rocket + 1.25m boosters. No fairing.

Control Surfaces+silly reaction wheel strength+RCS and going slow down low... almost anything can get to space.
Some of the stock vehicles are only meant to be examples of the kinds of things one can make in the game. They're aren't all meant to be practical.

I was able to put a 50+ ton He3-extracting rover on the Mun, lauched from Kerbin. Don't know the CC's mass precisely, but looking at it it can't be over 25 tons. Much smaller too.

Sure, I used mods, but it's in no mean that difficult in stock to do the same. Like it has been said before, imagination is only limited by part count.
